mapper.insert: insert into usageTbl (usageDate, classifyCard, usageUser, usageCard, sales, memberStore, cost, abstract1, abstract2, note) values (#{usageDate}, #{classifyCard}, #{usageUser}, #{usageCard}, #{sales}, #{memberStore}, #{cost}, #{abstract1}, #{abstract2}, #{note});
mapper.select: select sum(cost) as count from usageTbl;
